text: In Python programming, list is a very important data type.
If you want to store 10, 15, 20 things in a particular entity,
then you can make a list of it.
For example, you can make a list of marks of students of class 8,
or you can make a list of people living in Europe,
or you can make a list of people enrolled in 100 days of code Python.
By making all these lists, you can perform some operations on them,
you can iterate them, and you can call them by one name.
